#include <iostream>

using namespace std;
int arr[100];
int main()
{
    int t,i,n,counter=0;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>arr[i];
        }
        counter=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            counter +=arr[i]/(i+1);
        }
        if(counter%2==0)
           {cout<<"BOB"<<endl;}
        else
           {cout<<"ALICE"<<endl;}
    }
     return 0;
}
